alert.note: Alert for Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 12:53PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT GENEVA...NORTHWESTERN WALTON AND HOLMES COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM CST... At 1153 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Samson to 11 miles north of De Funiak Springs to 12 miles north of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Geneva, Hartford, Slocomb, Samson, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Coffee Springs, Noma, Black, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Kellys Crossroads, Cerrogordo, and Gritney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
